description: Break away from your everyday news and see the power of Digloo and Digg.com! People use Digg™ to submit and vote on news stories, images, and videos. You will find anything from the funniest wipeout videos on YouTube to the most current breaking news story on CNN. Interact with the community by posting comments and "Digging" or "Burying" stories and comments. Browse individual topics relevant to your interests. See what all the fuss is about! Digloo has a beautiful interface created just for webOS! Does not require a Digg account to use! **Version 1.3 adds the ability to post comments & bugfixes. Full details available @ davidstrack.com** Digloo is not affiliated with Digg, Inc in any way. Digloo uses the public Digg API to interact with the site.
